name: Dungeons of Iscara
description:
You play as Blitzen, a blue haired half fey trying to kill Kagnos, He who created the dungeons, The one true lord, and the being that killed your mother (Who was a true fey).  Enter a world full of magic, swords, quests, and baddies.  Fight bosses, clear dungeons, collect hundreds of items, armors, and weapons, cruise around on different ships, cook, and fish.  You can even explore the land masses that are still in development.  Choices you make will eventually impact the story.  Are you helpful or a criminal?  Thief, murderer, hero, or bystander?  Also the mazes are pretty cool.  Currently two continents are completed.

          Tutorial in game- Arrow keys to move, Shift to sprint, X to open menu, Z or enter to select or interact.

          Optimizing gear is stat based not ability based.  This means it doesn't always give you the best gear for you but it is quick.
